scripts.post-commit-task: git diff --name-only | grep '\.min\.js$' && (git add . && git commit -m 'chore: auto-commit minified files') || echo 'No minified files to commit'
scripts.post-commit-version-bump: lastTag=$(git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1)); IFS='.' read -ra ADDR <<< "$lastTag"; vNum=${ADDR[2]}; newVNum=$((vNum+1)); newTag="${ADDR[0]}.${ADDR[1]}.$newVNum"; git tag $newTag; git push origin $newTag; echo "New tag $newTag created and pushed"
